welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Fussa, Japan! Known for its beautiful cherry blossoms and rich history, this charming city invites you to immerse yourself in its unique culture and explore all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories in Fussa."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main international terminal at Yokota AFB Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Atsugi NAS Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Atsugi NAS Airport is used exclusively for military flights and operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Haneda Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal of Haneda Airport, mainly serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free Wi-Fi network by selecting 'HND Free Wi-Fi' and completing a short registration process.
